title: Executive Order-Amendment of Civil Service Rules
content: Special Departmental Rule No. 1 is hereby amended by adding to the exceptions from examination therein declared the following:
In the Department of Agriculture, in the office of the Secretary, division of illustration and engraving: One artist.
citation: Benjamin Harrison, Executive Order-Amendment of Civil Service Rules Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/205663
